long_description: When your favorite cross-country ski trails beckon, reach for our women's REI Winterflyte half-zip top and explore in the comfort of warm performance fabric. Comfortable blend of polyester and spandex dries quickly and wicks moisture to keep skin dry, and the fabric moves with you thanks to its 4-way stretch. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Half-length zipper lets you ventilate quickly when you heat up, and locking zipper won't bounce around during motion. Raglan sleeves and flatlock seams are designed for optimal motion and to reduce chafing. Zippered rear pocket with headphone port secures small items or music player. Thumbholes secure sleeves over hands for warmth. Reflective details enhance visibility in dim light. Front and back princess seams with ruching at side panels offer a flattering look; shirt features a contrast coverstitch and 26.5 in. back length. The women's REI Winterflyte half-zip shirt features an active fit.
short_description: When your favorite cross-country ski trails beckon, reach for our women's REI Winterflyte half-zip top and explore in the comfort of warm performance fabric.
